As far as I know Powerlinking belongs to the Energon and Armada styled tran=
sformers, and any Autobot or Decepticon that is here now in Neo Beast Wars =
had to be modified at least slightly to exist here. So many of the gimicks =
are gone - for example Scorponk cannot become a city sized defence base. I =
would imagine that that would apply to Powerlinking as well?

Preston
